name: Sabine Undersuit
description:
Item Type: Flight Suit
Damage Reduction: 10%
Temp. Rating: -40 / 40 °C
The Sabine embodies the advanced look and performance you expect from Quirinus Tech. This cutting edge undersuit integrates strong, yet flexible microweaves with strategically placed plating to provide protection while remaining lightweight. Featuring a sleek design, the Sabine undersuit will ensure you stay safe and stylish no matter the path ahead.
description_cn:
物品类型：飞行服
伤害减免：10%
适用温度：-40 / 40°C
萨宾护甲体现了您对奎里努斯科技先进的外观和性能的期望。这款先进的基底服将坚韧且灵活的微织物与巧妙的镀层融为一体，在保持轻量化的同时提供保护。萨宾基底服的时尚设计，即使前途多舛，仍可确保您安全时尚。
